projects.title: Artivest
projects.description: A showcase website for Artivest, a high-end Moroccan marble company. Developed to highlight the brand's products and expertise through an elegant design, image galleries, and an admin interface for content management. The project included frontend and backend development, with a focus on usability and maintainability.

projects.title: Employee Engagement Portal
projects.description: A Laravel-based web application developed to foster employee engagement within the organization. The platform features tools to recognize achievements, track performance, and improve internal communication. Contributed to the development of key components during a professional internship.

projects.title: AGEP
projects.description: A web platform designed to streamline the management of paramedical teams at the Polyclinique Internationale de La√¢youne. It automates HR processes, improves internal communication, and facilitates performance tracking for medical staff.
